biotools.summary: The COVID-19 ontology covers the role of molecular and cellular entities in virus-host-interactions, in the virus life cycle, as well as a wide spectrum of medical and epidemiological concepts linked to COVID-19.

bioschemas.name: COVID-19 Ontology
bioschemas.summary: The COVID-19 ontology covers the role of molecular and cellular entities in virus-host-interactions, in the virus life cycle, as well as a wide spectrum of medical and epidemiological concepts linked to COVID-19.
